page.title: 05An Upton Noble Dairy Farmer
page.content:
Mr.E.G.Cary owns Manor Farm.
{04.00 }Alarm goes he has a cup of tea. {04.10 }Gets cows from field. {04.45 }Starts milking his herd of 150 cows. {08.30} He has finished milking and washed milking parlour. {09.10 }Goes up and cuts some rye for the cows. {10.00} Comes in for breakfast. {10.35 }Checks dry cows and calves. {10.45 }Starts hauling heifers over to the other farm at{Mells. {14.15 }Has his dinner. {14.30 }Gets ready for milking again. {14.35} Fetches cows from the field.{ {15.15} Starts milking. {19.00 }Finished milking and washed parlour. {19.10 }Has tea and watches T.V. {22.10 }Checks cows & goes to bed.
